flawed_nl_solution:
The tree has been planted for 9 - 4 = <<9-4=5>>5 years
It will take another 7 - 5 = <<7-5=1>>1 years for it to bear fruit
Lydia will be 9 + 1 = <<9+1=10>>10 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 1. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
